# `AppleAuthentication` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| oauthClientId | `string` | No | The Apple Messages for Business OAuth client id. |
| oauthClientSecret | `string` | No | The Apple Messages for Business OAuth client secret. |
| oauthTokenUrl | `string` | No | The Apple Messages for Business token URL. |
| oauthScope | `string` | No | The Apple Messages for Business OAuth scope. |
